page.title: 04All About Potters Bar
page.content: I like Potters Bar because it has got lots of sports things. There is a swimming pool which is having a new weight training room built and it already has squash courts and some tennis courts.I sometimes go to the swimming pool for lessons. I also like the big field because it is very good for football and cricket.I like our neighbourhood because it is within walking distance from our school. I like our school because all my friends go. I also think the woods are very nice because there is a lot of nature and it is nice to go there on a bike.
